Description:
**UNDER OFFER / UNDER CONTRACT**
RANGEBANK ESTATE: Set in a very quiet back street away from all the noise, hustle and bustle, this well kept home has been loved and cared for by one solitary owner and has easily grown and adapted to their changing needs. Offered to the market for the first time, 25 Toirram Crescent is sure to appeal to growing and extended families who need plenty of space to roam!
Fronted by neat gardens plus an appealing facade with a double carport, you step inside to find an inviting floor plan with near new timber flooring throughout the living zones that include a front lounge/dining room plus the huge rear-set rumpus. The separate meals area conveniently adjoins the immaculate updated hostess kitchen complete with stainless steel appliances!
Accommodation is the true highlight with no less than 5 bedrooms featuring a master boasting a walk-in wardrobe plus a full ensuite to complement the family bathroom and second toilet.
Ducted heating and evaporative cooling will ensure your comfort throughout the year, whilst outside you will be greeted by a generous pergola that's bound to be a hit during the warmer months. All this a whole lot more overlooking the carefree back yard with plenty of room for the kids and pets to play.
If you believe in the age-old theory that a top location equals great real estate then this is an absolute must to inspect! Sensational position within walking distance to Lawson Poole Reserve, Rangebank Primary School and the local kindergarten. Close proximity to buses, Merinda Park train station and the recently revamped Thompson Road en route to Marriott Waters, the Cranbourne Home Maker Centre and the Cranbourne Park Shopping Centre!
With the turnover in this popular estate at an all-time low don't delay or else you will miss out!

PRIVACY, SPACE & CONVENIENCE
Situated on a massive 890m2 block at the end of a quiet court in the superb Sladen Park Estate, this spacious home comprises 4 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms and 3 living areas providing space for everyone and everything! As you enter the home you will find a large front lounge room with the master bedroom, bathroom and 4th bedroom while in the centre of the home is the modernised fully appointed kitchen with ample bench and storage space adjoining the family & dining area with the rumpus room to the rear. Complete with side access for additional cars/trailers etc, you also have a wide driveway leading to the pitched carport.

A large concreted driveway and carport is the first bonus to greet you as you enter the property ensuring there will be ample parking for everyone.
Polished hardwood flooring will meet you at the front entrance hall, then continue through the rest of the property. Positioned at the front is the lounge room with fireplace and split system air conditioner. This leads into the meals area and tiled kitchen with gas stove and electric oven. Off the hallway you will find 3 spacious bedrooms, 2 with built in wardrobes. Positioned central to the bedrooms is the family bathroom, a separate toilet is located off the hallway.
This neat home is positioned on a 585sqm block, giving it a generous back yard with manicured lawns, vegetable plot and well-maintained garden beds. Located at the back of the property in line with the driveway is a double garage that can also be used as a generous workshop.
Features to this property include: split system air conditioner, heating, exterior roller blinds, hardwood flooring, gas cooking and much more.
You need look no further, don't miss out on this fantastic opportunity.

Cranbourne Central provides the perfect combination for any resident.
